page.title: 16SHOPPING IN HOLMES CHAPEL
page.content: There are over 50 shops, offices and banks offering a wide range of goods and services. Most of the shops are small specialist shops offering personal and friendly service. New housing developments have brought more residents to the village, and the number of shops has grown to meet the demand. {14 FOOD SHOPS:}2 supermarkets, 2 bread and cake, 2 butchers, 2 sweet, 2 wine, 2 greengrocers, 1 fish & chip, 1 delicatessen {6 CLOTHES SHOPS:}2 sport & leisure wear, 1 shoe shop, 3 ladies' fashions {OTHER SHOPS:}2 newsagents, 2 gift, 1 video, 2 sewing, 1 chemists, 5 hairdressers, 1 health & beauty, 2 hardware, 1 agricultural equipment, 2 electrical, 1 licensed betting, 1 travel agent.
